p: In this review, the characteristics, activity and usage of remdesivir for treatment of COVID-19 aere discussed. An electronic search was done using databases “PubMed” and “Google Scholar”. Key search terms included the association of the following words: “remdesivir”, “COVID-19”, “SARS-CoV-2”, “SARS-CoV”, “MERS-CoV”, “clinical use”, “therapeutic applications”, “pharmacodynamics”, “pharmacokinetics”, “dosing”, “adverse effects”, “RNA-dependent RNA polymerase”, “2019-nCoV”, “Ebola virus”, “safety”, “mechanism of action”, “clinical trial”, “diagnosis” and “intravenous administration”. Studies without available full-text and studies with title and abstract in English but with a full-text in non-English language were excluded.
